body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Alabama native. Married to Mary Melton. Father of Merritt C. Melton, Eliza J. Melton, Margiana Melton, Henry R. Melton, French M. Melton, and Mary G. Melton. Farmer in Ballard County in 1850 and 1860.
